title: Jaffna University students meet President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Students from the Ramanathan Academy of Fine Arts of Jaffna University enjoyed a very rare opportunity today on 11 April when they visited Colombo for an educational trip. It is the first time in their lifetime these students have visited southern part of Sri Lanka….
